7.4.2.5. glofrim.Glofrim.get_var_shape¶

Glofrim.get_var_shape(long_var_name)[source]¶

Provides shape of variable.

Arguments:
long_var_name {str} – long name of exposed model variable
Returns:
tuple – shape of specified variable
